requirements.description: A web-based application providing a functional scientific calculator with basic arithmetic and advanced scientific operations.

features.name: Basic Arithmetic Operations
features.description: Support for addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division.

features.name: Scientific Functions
features.description: Includes trigonometric functions (sin, cos, tan), inverse trigonometric functions, logarithmic functions (log, ln), exponential functions (e^x, x^y), square root, cube root, factorial, and percentage.

features.name: Mathematical Constants
features.description: Buttons for common constants like Pi (π) and Euler's number (e).

features.name: Parentheses Support
features.description: Allow users to group operations using parentheses for order of operations.

features.name: Degree/Radian Toggle
features.description: Ability to switch between degree and radian modes for trigonometric calculations.

features.name: Memory Functions
features.description: Standard calculator memory functions (M+, M-, MR, MC) to store and recall values.

features.name: Clear and Backspace
features.description: Buttons for 'All Clear' (AC) to reset the calculator and 'Clear Entry' (CE) or Backspace to delete the last input.

features.name: Expression Display
features.description: A clear display area showing the current input expression and the calculated result.

features.name: Error Handling
features.description: Graceful handling and display of errors like division by zero, invalid input, or mathematical domain errors.

requirements.user_input: build a simple scientific calculator website
